item.title: Project 7 : Deep Learning Classification on Social Media
item.description: This project is my second take on the “Real or Not ? NLP with Disaster Tweets” Kaggle competition, in which we are provided a list of tweets that can either be about a disaster or not. You can find my first attempt here Last time, I was a rather junior data scientist. I focused heavily on feature engineering and bags of words to put into machine learning model, and managed to obtain a decent score of 78% with ensemble models.
